member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.AuthorizationLevel
member.summary: Enum used to specify the authorization level for http functions.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.AuthorizationLevel.Anonymous
member.summary: Allow access to anonymous requests.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.AuthorizationLevel.User
member.summary: Allow access to requests that include a valid authentication token

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.AuthorizationLevel.Function
member.summary: Allow access to requests that include a function key

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.AuthorizationLevel.System
member.summary: Allows access to requests that include a system key

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.AuthorizationLevel.Admin
member.summary: Allow access to requests that include the master key

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.HttpExtensionConfiguration
member.summary: Defines the configuration options for the Http binding.

member.summary: Constructs a new instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.HttpExtensionConfiguration.RoutePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the default route prefix that will be applied to function routes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.HttpExtensionConfiguration.MaxOutstandingRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of outstanding requests that will be held at any given time. This limit includes requests that have started executing, as well as requests that have not yet started executing. If this limit is exceeded, new requests will be rejected with a 429 status code.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.HttpExtensionConfiguration.MaxConcurrentRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of http functions that will be allowed to execute in parallel.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.HttpExtensionConfiguration.DynamicThrottlesEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether dynamic host counter checks should be enabled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.HttpExtensionConfiguration.SetResponse
member.summary: Hook to enable a host to receive the response

member.summary: Initializes the extension.

member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether all incoming requests should be rejected, for example due to host overload, etc.

member.summary: Initializes a fast . This constructor does not cache the helper. For caching, use .

member.summary: Gets the backing .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.Name
member.summary: Gets (or sets in derived types) the property name.

member.summary: Gets the property value getter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.ValueSetter
member.summary: Gets the property value setter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.GetValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the property value for the specified .
member.param: The object whose property value will be returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the property value for the specified .
member.param: The object whose property value will be set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.GetProperties(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the underlying type.
member.param: the instance to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: a cached array of all public property getters from the underlying type of target instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.GetProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the specified type.
member.param: the type to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: a cached array of all public property getters from the type of target instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.GetVisibleProperties(System.Object)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The instance to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public property getters from the instance's type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.GetVisibleProperties(System.Type)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The type to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public property getters from the type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.MakeNullSafeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter which is safe for a null input object. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertySetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property setter for reference types. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the setter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed. This only works for reference types.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.PropertyHelper.ObjectToDictionary(System.Object)
member.summary: Given an object, adds each instance property with a public get method as a key and its associated value to a dictionary. If the object is already an instance, then a copy is returned.
member.remarks: The implementation of PropertyHelper will cache the property accessors per-type. This is faster when the the same type is used multiple times with ObjectToDictionary.
member.returns: The dictionary representation of the object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.Http.Utility.ApplyBindingData(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Applies any additional binding data from the input value to the specified binding data. This binding data then becomes available to the binding process (in the case of late bound bindings)
